page.title: 20HOUSING IN POLLOK, GLASGOW
page.content: The majority of housing in the area was built during the 20 yrs.following WW2;by the council.Pollok however is by no means a homogeneous estate as there is a wide variety of house types 2,3,4,storey tenenments 4 in a block, semi-detached,terraced and detached. There is a shortage of special needs housing.{PROBLEMS:}some of the housing is of low quality and dampness and vandalism have become a major problem. Improvements have been taking place with the modernisation of housing, demolition of poorer quality housing and private developers moving into the area.{CONTRIBUTORS:-} St Convals Pr.6. page 2,3,5,9.Levern Pr.7 pg.7,l0,l2,15, l9.
